name: Ak Spreid
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. If your opponent played a SPELL card with a "Thunder" Attribute in their last turn, add 4000 Power and 2 Damage to this SPELL card. Mamodo: Penny
Penny's 3rd spell. It fires back the opponent's energy that was absorbed by Penny's Ashield spell.

name: Ak Spreid
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. If you played an Ashield SPELL card in your opponent's last turn, add 4000 Power and 2 Damage to this SPELL card. Mamodo: Penny
Penny's 3rd spell. It fires back the opponent's energy that was absorbed by Ashield spell.

name: Akur
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Penny
Penny's 1st spell. It fires a strong current of water against opponents.

name: Ashield
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. Negate all your opponent's SPELL cards with a "Thunder" Attribute, regardless of their Power. Mamodo: Penny
Penny's 2nd spell. A water shield. It also absorbs energy.

name: Bao Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 4th spell. As Zatch and Kiyo battle, more power accumulates an Zatch is able to launch a powerful lightning dragon.

name: Bao Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, your opponent can neither SACRIFICE nor PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 4th spell. As Zatch and Kiyo battle, more power accumulates and Zatch is able to launch a powerful lightning dragon.

name: Bari {A strong King}
effect: [1 MP] Add 1000 Power to this MAMODO card when it Attacks. In addition, increase Damage by 1 when this MAMODO card inflicts Damage. Partner: Gustav
"The strongest king, who will never give in to anything!"

name: Blizzard Thing
effect: [In Play] Add 2000 Power to all your SPELL cards with an "Ice" Attribute. This effect cannot be duplicated.
He is a young man with the ability to freeze things.

name: Brago {Gravity Attack}
effect: Partner: Sherry
Brago has the ability to control gravity.

name: Brago {Preparing To Destroy}
effect: [1 MP] Flip a coin when you play an "Attack" SPELL card for this MAMODO card; if it's heads, the SPELL card Injures one your opponent's MAMODO cards of your choice (its regular effect is negated). If it's tails, negate the SPELL card. Partner: Sherry
"This is going to be the end."

name: Brago {Unemotional Victory}
effect: [Declare To Use] Turn a page of your opponent's Spell Book when they are on the last page of their Spell Book. If your opponent cannot negate this card's effect or otherwise avoid turning the last page, you win the game. Partner: Sherry
"Let go of your weak thoughts! Don't be so optimistic."

name: Brutal Tia
effect: Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. Your opponent cannot play any SPELL cards for that MAMODO card during this turn.
"Give me a break!"

name: Byonko {An Intrusion}
effect: [Send this card to the discard pile] Negate 1 of your opponent's EVENT or SPELL cards during your opponent's BATTLE PHASE. Partner: Alvin
"Ribbit! I won't let you do that, ribbit!"

name: Cut N' Paste {Crafty Mamodo}
effect: [In Play] Look at the open pages of your opponent's Spell Book. Then, select either card and send it to the Discard Pile. This effect can be played only once per game (per player). Partner: Kichiro
A mamodo who uses paste and scissors as a weapon.

name: Danny {Continuous Punch}
effect: [1 MP] This card may Attack without using a SPELL card (Total Power=6000, Damage=1). This effect can be played up to twice per turn (per player). Partner: Mr. Goldo
A mamodo who moves quickly and has outstanding strength.

name: Danny's Real Power
effect: Add 5000 Power to 1 of your MAMODO cards. Send the MAMODO card to the Discard Pile at the END PHASE of this turn.
Danny's power from within enables him to defend.

name: Dikaporuk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé's 3rd spell. Enables Kanchomé to make a gigantic replica of himself.

name: Dikaporuk
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, the MAMODO card this SPELL card is played for cannot be Injured during this turn. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé's 3rd spell. "Ha ha ha ha ha. Did you realize my power?"

name: Dinosaur Arm
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Add 2000 Power to all your MAMODO cards' Total Power when they Attack during this turn.

name: Dioga Gravidon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book and Injure all your opponent's MAMODO cards when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Brago

name: Donpoccho {Pleading For Life}

name: Doru ZOrnis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Bari

effect: [Send this card to the discard pile] Increase the MP cost of the EVENT card your opponent plays next by 3. MAMODO: Grisor

name: Dr. Riddles
effect: [Send this card to the discard pile] You can play any EVENT card in any pocket of your Spell Book by paying an MP cost of 1 highr than its original MP cost. Mamodo: Kido

name: Dr. Riddles
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Negate the EVENT card your opponent just played. Mamodo: Kido

name: Eido
effect: [Send this card to the discard pile] the MP cost of the SPELL card you play next for Hyde is considered to be 0. Mamodo: Hyde

effect: [In Play] Add 2000 Power to all your SPELL cards with a "Fire" Attribute. This effect cannot be duplicated.

name: Gerhart

effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Bari

effect: Flip a coin for each your opponent's in-play MAMODO cards, if it's heads, your opponent can neither play SPELL cards for the MAMODO card nor use effects of the MAMODO card. This SPELL cannot be defended. Mamodo: Kido

effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 5th spell. "Don't stop, follow through! Zakeruga!"

name: Zarushield
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack regardless of their Power. Then, turn a page of your Spell Book. Mamodo: Bari
Bari's 5th spell. It creates a shield.

name: Zatch Bell {Go For It!}
effect: [1 MP] Flip a coin; if it's heads, the SPELL card you play next for this MAMODO card cannot be Defended. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"Even in times of difficulty, Zatch never gives up and pushes ahead."

name: Zatch Bell {I Love Yellowtail!}
effect: [Declare to use] When your opponent gets MP by card effects, get an equal ammount of MP. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"Kiyo! Let's eat it together."

name: Zatch Bell {Strong Resolve}
effect: Partner: Kiyo Takamine
Zatch is pure of heart and courageous.

name: Zatch Bell {There Is No Turning Back}
effect: [In Play] Neither player can turn back any pages of their Spell Book during the BATTLE PHASE. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"A kind king-that's the only thing that I want to be."

name: Zegar
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kido
Kido's 1st spell. When Kido's mouth opens, a ball of energy is fired!

name: Zegaruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kido
Kido's 4th spell. A reinforced version of Zegar.

name: Zeno {Extermination}
effect: [2 MP] When your opponent has 6 or more cards in play, send 1 of the cards of your choice to the Discard Pile. Partner: Dufort
"I'm sorry, but I won't let you go."

name: Zeno {Regal Lightning}
effect: Partner: Dufort
Zeno strongly resembles Zatch, but they differ in personality.

name: Zonis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Bari
Bari's 1st spell. Energy fires out of his hornes. The reverse thrust enables him to fly.
